arts.ttl: Juventus and Lens at Impasse Over Kevin Danso Transfer
arts.sum: Reports from Italy suggest the negotiations between Juventus and Lens for Kevin Danso have reached a stalemate. While the Austrian defender has expressed his desire to don the black and white jersey, the main hurdle remains the transfer formula. The post Juventus and Lens at Impasse Over Kevin Danso Transfer appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Juventus Target Lens Star After Another Injury Blow
arts.sum: Juventus director Cristiano Giuntoli stated they were set on Wednesday, but the standpoint didn’t last long, as the Bianconeri were forced to dive back into the transfer market since they lost Pierre Kalulu for a while and reignited the talks to onboard Danso from Lens, The post Juventus Target Lens Star After Another Injury Blow appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.

arts.ttl: Official | Montpellier leading goalscorer Arnaud Nordin joins Mainz
arts.sum: Another key attacking piece at Montpellier HSC will not be around to help them in their quest to avoid relegation. A day after Akor Adams (24) signed with Sevilla in…

arts.ttl: Aston Villa rival Wolves’ interest in Kevin Danso
arts.sum: Aston Villa are looking to strengthen their back line before the closure of the transfer window. Axel Disasi (26) is the priority but, as reported by L’Équipe, Chelsea are blocking his departure,…

arts.ttl: Rennes in talks to sign Montpellier’s Musa Al-Taamari
arts.sum: L’Équipe understands that Stade Rennais and Montpellier HSC are in talks over the transfer of Jordanian forward Musa Al-Taamari (27). Montpellier, despite their perilous league standing, are open to selling Al-Taamari…

arts.ttl: Juventus Close to Sealing Danso Deal, Awaiting Final Approval from Lens
arts.sum: Juventus and Lens are in the final stages of negotiations for the transfer of French defender Kevin Danso. Gianluca Di Marzio reports that talks between the two clubs continued through the night of Thursday, January 30, and into Friday, January 31, as they work to finalize the details of the move. The post Juventus Close to Sealing Danso Deal, Awaiting Final Approval from Lens appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Wolves express interest in Udinese defender as they look set to miss out on Lens centre-back Kevin Danso
arts.sum: SIMON JONES: Wolves made two bids for Danso but were unable to agree a fee with Lens for the 26-year-old. The Ligue 1 side are demanding a fee of £26m for Danso, who is also wanted by Rennes.

arts.ttl: Juventus nearing move for Lens’ Kevin Danso
arts.sum: Serie A giants Juventus are now nearing a move to Lens defender Kevin Danso. The Bianconeri have failed in moves for Newcastle United’s Lloyd Kelly and West Ham’s Jean-Clair Todibo.…

arts.ttl: Juventus set to beat Wolves in the race to sign Kevin Danso from Lens
arts.sum: According to Fabrizio Romano, Juventus are close to agreeing a deal to sign Kevin Danso (26) on loan until the end of the season from Lens. The Serie A club are…

arts.ttl: Juventus Take the Lead in Race for Lens Defender Kevin Danso
arts.sum: Juventus continue to bolster their squad in the January transfer window, with their sights set on Lens defender Kevin Danso. Following Danilo's departure and Pierre Kalulu's injury setback, the Bianconeri are inching closer to securing the services of the 26-year-old Austrian international. The post Juventus Take the Lead in Race for Lens Defender Kevin Danso appeared first on FootItalia.com.
